test-set.name: prod-ContextItemDecl
test-set.description: Tests for the prod-ContextItemDecl production introduced in XQuery 3.0

test-case.name: contextDecl-014
test-case.description: Forwards reference to context item.

test-case.name: contextDecl-015
test-case.description: It is a static error if the initializer of the context item depends on the context item.

test-case.name: contextDecl-016
test-case.description: Context position in default value for external variable.

test-case.name: contextDecl-017
test-case.description: Context last in default value for external variable.

test-case.name: contextDecl-018
test-case.description: Context last in default value for context item. (Debatable!)
test-case.test: declare context item := last() + 1; .

test-case.name: contextDecl-019
test-case.description: Context position in default value for context item. (Debatable!)
test-case.test: declare context item := position() + 1; .

test-case.name: contextDecl-020
test-case.description: External context item has wrong type
test-case.test: declare context item as xs:integer external; .

test-case.name: contextDecl-021
test-case.description: Internal context item has wrong type
test-case.test: declare context item as xs:integer := 'London'; .

test-case.name: contextDecl-022
test-case.description: Default context item has wrong type; error is optional?
test-case.test: declare context item as xs:string := 2; .

test-case.name: contextDecl-023
test-case.description: Context item type must be an item type (no occurrence indicator)
test-case.test: declare context item as xs:integer+ := (1 to 17)[position() = 5]; .

test-case.name: contextDecl-028
test-case.description: Context item bound to an atomic value
test-case.test: declare context item := 3; . + 4

test-case.name: contextDecl-029
test-case.description: Context item bound to a node
test-case.test: declare context item := bananas; string-length()

test-case.name: contextDecl-030
test-case.description: Context item bound to a node
test-case.test: declare context item := bananas; string-length(@id)

test-case.name: contextDecl-031
test-case.description: Context item bound to a function item
test-case.test: declare context item := contains(?, "e"); .("raspberry")

test-case.name: contextDecl-032
test-case.description: Context item bound to an empty sequence. Spec unclear, see bug 19257
test-case.test: declare context item := (1 to 17)[20]; .

test-case.name: contextDecl-033
test-case.description: Context item bound to a non-singleton sequence. Spec unclear, see bug 19257
test-case.test: declare context item := (1 to 17)[position() gt 5]; .

test-case.name: contextDecl-034
test-case.description: Context item successfully matches its type
test-case.test: declare context item as xs:integer := (1 to 17)[position() = 5]; .

test-case.name: contextDecl-035
test-case.description: Context item successfully matches its type
test-case.test: declare context item as xs:integer := (1 to 17)[position() = 5]; .

test-case.name: contextDecl-036
test-case.description: Context item fails to match its type
test-case.test: declare context item as xs:integer := current-date(); .

test-case.name: contextDecl-037
test-case.description: Function conversion rules not applied to context item
test-case.test: declare context item as xs:integer := 23; .

test-case.name: contextDecl-038
test-case.description: Function conversion rules not applied to context item
test-case.test: declare context item as xs:anyURI := "http://www.w3.org/"; .

test-case.name: contextDecl-039
test-case.description: Function conversion rules not applied to context item
test-case.test: declare context item as xs:double := 1.234; .

test-case.name: contextDecl-040
test-case.description: Require an external context item, no required type
test-case.test: declare context item external; . instance of document-node()

test-case.name: contextDecl-041
test-case.description: Require an external context item, with required type
test-case.test: declare context item as document-node() external; name(/*)

test-case.name: contextDecl-042
test-case.description: Require an external context item, with default (no type)
test-case.test: declare context item external := 17; . = 17

test-case.name: contextDecl-043
test-case.description: Require an external context item, with default (with type)
test-case.test: declare context item as xs:integer external := 17; . = 17

test-case.name: contextDecl-044
test-case.description: Require an external context item, with default (with wrong type)
test-case.test: declare context item as xs:double external := 17; . = 17

test-case.name: contextDecl-045
test-case.description: Require an external context item but none supplied
test-case.test: declare context item as xs:double external; . = 17

test-case.name: contextDecl-046
test-case.description: More than one context item declaration

test-case.name: contextDecl-047
test-case.description: Context item declaration constraining type appears in library module
test-case.test: import module namespace m="http://www.w3.org/TestModules/libmodule2"; . gt xs:date('1900-01-01')

test-case.name: contextDecl-048
test-case.description: Context item declaration with default value appears in library module
test-case.test: import module namespace m="http://www.w3.org/TestModules/libmodule1"; . = 17

test-case.name: contextDecl-049
test-case.description: Context item declaration with type appears in library module

test-case.name: contextDecl-050
test-case.description: Context item declaration with different type appears in library module

test-case.name: contextDecl-051
test-case.description: Context item declaration with different type appears in library module

test-case.name: contextDecl-052
test-case.description: Context item declaration in library module with initial value
test-case.test: import module namespace m="http://www.w3.org/TestModules/libmodule3"; . eq 23

test-case.name: contextDecl-053
test-case.description: Dynamic circularity involving function lookup

test-case.name: contextDecl-054
test-case.description: Context item declaration constraining type appears in library module
test-case.test: import module namespace m="http://www.w3.org/TestModules/libmodule2"; xs:date(.) gt xs:date('1900-01-01')

test-case.name: contextDecl-055
test-case.description: Forwards reference to context item involving function lookup
